findings.title: Approve Race
findings.description: The standard ERC20 implementation contains a widely-known racing condition in its approve function, wherein a spender is able to witness the token owner broadcast a transaction altering their approval and quickly sign and broadcast a transaction using transferFrom to move the current approved amount from the owner’s balance to the spender.

findings.title: Usage of block.timestamp
findings.description: The variable block.timestamp does not always reflect the current time and may be inaccurate, as it can be influenced by miners.
